view

Class GameView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • view.GameComponent
            • view.WorldView
              • view.GameView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, java.util.Observer, GameObserver

    public class GameView
extends WorldView
implements java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.ActionListener
    This is a class that just contains the game itself Is listener to itself in order to zoom and other stuff. Some events gets sent to others... is observer at the model on updates there (new objects?)
    Version:
    2016-02-05
    Author:
    Gustav
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
